description: These functions look to do pretty much the same thing.  It seems like we should be able to combine the functions into a single implementation.
title: xenapi: refactor _find_vdi_refs and lookup_vm_vdis

comments.content: These functions look to do pretty much the same thing.  It seems like we should be able to combine the functions into a single implementation.

comments.content: I'm also marking the bug as Opinion because it's an artifact that was created for a cleanup by the author. It's a fine fix, and happy to reopen but not something we should keep open in current state.

comments.content:

Reason: This review is > 4 weeks without comment, and failed Jenkins the last time it was checked. We are abandoning this for now. Feel free to reactivate the review by pressing the restore button and leaving a 'recheck' comment to get fresh test results.
